website_summaries.verdict: A good choice if you're looking for better sound at an affordable price in your vehicle.
pros: Compatible with a wide variety of audio media formats such as MP3, WMA, and WMV files
The included remote is a convenient way for passengers, particularly in the backseat, to control the music playback on the go
The stereo includes a five-band equalizer to shape the sound to your preference
cons: The included remote can experience spotty connection issues at times

website_summaries.verdict: Versatile car stereo that offers CD, MP3 and WMA playback.
pros: CD, MP3 and WMA playback, front AUX input, and Advanced Sound Retriever tech
LCD display is 35% larger than previous models
Can play CDs and take audio from smartphones via a 3.5mm mini-jack
cons: It may lack necessary wires needed to install

customer_reviews.title: Good for my old beater truck.
customer_reviews.text: I needed a quick fix for the antique aftermarket CD player in my '95 S10. This fit the bill perfectly. Has an aux input for my phone and installed with the previous mounting kit. Can't ask for much more. The truck is NOT Fancy to say the least, so I wasn't going to drop huge money on a nice stereo for it. It's just a spare vehicle, anyway. So, this radio is good stuff.
customer_reviews.author: Tyson&Lindzey

customer_reviews.title: Great look and sound.
customer_reviews.text: Works great in my 98 Jeep TJ. Make sure you get someone to wire it or use a repair manual as some of the wire coating don’t exactly match up perfect. Sounds great for the price. Red led display isn’t hard on the eyes which is why I got this one instead of the others. Buy a lightening port to aux cable like I did instead of getting Bluetooth. Doesn’t drain battery like Bluetooth. Actually charges your phone instead. Great buy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: For the price its great!
customer_reviews.text: UPDATE!!! replacement deck developed trouble after a few months of normal use! save your money. avoid. Easy install with the right install kit. Not bad sound for the price. Wasn't looking for a boomer. Great for the work van. Controls are a little bit of a pain in the a$$ But not that big a deal. I'm satisfied. Got my infinity system in the other ride $$$$$. If I want. If you gonna get critical then open your wallet wider or get over it.
customer_reviews.author: 3 Three deuces

customer_reviews.title: Could have had a better experience with this unit.
customer_reviews.text: I like Pioneer, but two things: the display is very hard to see in daylight. Also, after about three weeks in the car, yesterday it began to heat up and smoke internally, freaked out my wife on the way to work. By phone, I talked her through pulling it and disconnecting it so she would not have any surprises on the way home. No idea what's up...return window closed...will have to figure out a replacement.
customer_reviews.author: TheBigMan

customer_reviews.title: Good radio, good price
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. My old radio pooped out. With a Metra install kit I was able to do the install in about two hours. There are a lot of bells and whistles on the radio that I have not figured out yet. But, what I have determined is that it produces a nice sound on FM radio when paired with some JVC speakers
customer_reviews.author: Colleen Grotke

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: high quality very satisfied with this product Fits my Toyota Camry 1999 .No additional frame was needed.
customer_reviews.author: M.Baeshen

customer_reviews.title: Dead after 3 years
customer_reviews.text: Put this radio/cd player in a truck that I drive during the winter. It worked great for the first two years I used it and had no problems. Now when I got the truck out to drive this winter, the unit was dead. I checked the fuse and made sure there was power to the unit, but it is not working. It does not turn on at all. Would not buy this again, it should have lasted much longer than this.
customer_reviews.author: Tom S.

customer_reviews.title: Connect the blue wire!!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Got everything connected but didn't produce sound. Played with everything for a couple days and just about sent it back. Figured I would try plugging the blue remote control wire ( had a flag on it to signify it didn't need to connect to anything) into blue antenna wire to see if it would work. BAM, that worked. Figured out all the audio options pretty quick but doesn't have very good sound tuning so by the time I get it to sound good, the next following song souds like crap.
customer_reviews.author: Mr Happy

customer_reviews.title: Awesome radio/CD
customer_reviews.text: Great radio. I replaced factory one in car and the sound is remarkably better. Only issue is - display is difficult to read during the day. Would be better if background of display was lighter color with black characters, the white/gray just doesn't show well against the grayish background
customer_reviews.author: LGS

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the money, easy install.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this head unit because my factory radio in my 2013 smart car was hit and miss on working and had no extras. The CD player is great for me, as well as the mp3 jack. I drive about an hour each way to work. I also ordered the 6.5 door speakers that are 4 way. It all sounds great. Very much worth the money. And easy install.
customer_reviews.author: dee727

customer_reviews.title: ARC is useless, should have bluetooth for the price
customer_reviews.text: Radio is nice overall, not sure of the point of the ARC app. Much easier to just use aux instead of lugging my charging cable to my car. Was disappointed it didn't have bluetooth, I guess for the price I didn't even bother to check considering $20 radios have bluetooth now. Does NOT fit snugly into my C5 Corvette. Had to tilt it just a little bit, but it's not even noticeable. But when installing, the faceplate will not sit perfectly flush with whatever 1.5 to single din backing plate you use. For the price I don't understand why bluetooth isn't included.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: This is a great deck for the price
customer_reviews.text: This is a great deck for the price. It's good for any replacement in cars that just need a good player while keeping up with technology. It has AUX input that allows mp3 players and cell phones or iPad and tablets can to be played but plays plane old CD'S for those of us who still burn their own or buy them still. To make it a better sound system just and a low power amp and subwoofer and just can't beat the sound and value.
customer_reviews.author: Sean T.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Stereo & Unbeatable Price
customer_reviews.text: GREAT stereo at a SPECTACULAR price! I needed to replace the broken stereo in my SuperDuty before selling it and I didn't to spend too much. I wanted a name brand stereo that looks good and this was exactly that. Comes with everything needed. Looks great installed & functions flawlessly! FYI Car stereos are actually very easy to install, especially if you car already has an aftermarket single DIN stereo installed. Just youtube single DIN stereo install. I would highly recommend this stereo to anyone looking for a budget friendly car stereo option.
customer_reviews.author: Lyndon

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Bought it around a year ago and it's still working as if it was day one. Mainly got it for the aux but have used the cd play a little and works as should. Bought it for my 05 Honda Civic. Only complaint is that I didn't buy the harness which would have made it 100x easier but all well. My only complaint is that it's damn near impossible to read the clock during the day. But such a small price to pay. Pros +easy install (if you get the harness) +aux +cd player Negatives -can't really see during the day. All in all. This is definitely worth the price
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works Wonders. excellent as replacement of OEMs.
customer_reviews.text: Works great. It has an option to dim the illumination when the radio is on and, if off, you can set it to leave the illumination on or turn ir off completely. the EQ is ok, it gives various presets and that it. Remote works well so far. bunch of other options like bass boost, and things like that. Feels a bit dated since this one doesn't have Bluetooth and what not. But hey is waaaaay better than having no radio at all. Aux port works great, very good sound quallity. Excellent radio if you need to replace a bad one or OEM ones.
customer_reviews.author: JC Cruz

customer_reviews.title: Like it
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this radio since mine went out and it works great. It does everything it says it does. Great price too.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole M

customer_reviews.title: I just think I ended up with a crappy one because the detachable face will not stay on ...
customer_reviews.text: For the price, the features and sound quality is very decent. I just think I ended up with a crappy one because the detachable face will not stay on locked. If I pull out the 3.5mm cable from AUX port, the faceplate comes off. If I press on the face on certain area, it comes off. However, it doesn't come off completely, which is an another issue with mine: once detached, I have to wiggle around to get it out completely. Some days it makes me want to just yank the crap off.
customer_reviews.author: R. Han

customer_reviews.title: very good delivery, Easy enough to install
customer_reviews.text: As described, reasonably priced, very good delivery, Easy enough to install. Had to do a little cutting but the radio and dash bezels transition perfectly. Good sound. Speaker selection would be crucial for best performance. For the price I can't imagine doing any better.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT PURCHASE
customer_reviews.text: What a total piece of garbage. USB port doesn't support IPhone in any way shape or form. Want to use a flash drive? Good luck, continuous Errors prevent it even after multiple formats (NTFS, FAT32, FAT64, etc etc). Other than install being pretty easy, this thing is a waste. I'd sent it back, but I'm more tempted to go skeet shooting with it. Last Pioneer product I will buy.
customer_reviews.author: christopher wenzel

customer_reviews.title: GREAT FOR MY NEW BEETLE
customer_reviews.text: This CD/Aux player is great! I bought this, and had it installed in my 1999 Volkswagen New Beetle. It plays CD's great, and doesn't skip on bumpy roads (which is common here in Ohio) and the Aux is my favorite part of this stereo. I enjoy being able to play my iPhone without having that lousy Cassette Adapter! I will say, when I first had the system installed I was adjusting some things like Bass and stuff. That was a bit confusing at first so perhaps if you do buy this you may want to take time to get to know it before you start pressing allot of buttons trying to figure out what is what.
customer_reviews.author: Cody Dixon

customer_reviews.title: Nice car replacement stereo.
customer_reviews.text: Great replacement radio. Was difficult to install as I was unable to figure out how to match the wiring up with my 1994 Suburban. My youngest son was able to find the problem and it now works great. I was getting an amp error message.
customer_reviews.author: John Lauffer

customer_reviews.title: Good simple deck
customer_reviews.text: Works as expected. Unit is a simple single din AM/FM CD player with a AUX port. Wiring is standard. I have only 4 4” speakers connected to it so there is plenty of power from the deck. Installation is straight forward. Good deal for the price.
customer_reviews.author: LAWRENCE K.

customer_reviews.title: Very nice car stereo!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this radio on behalf of a friend. He loved it right away. It's looking good on his car. Although it's a relatively cheap car stereo, the construction quality and assembly seems to be very good.
customer_reviews.author: Carlos J

customer_reviews.title: Difficult to navigate through settings, even changing volume can be difficult
customer_reviews.text: This isn't a terrible product for the price, but navigating through the settings is very difficult and awkward. Sometimes I use the forward/backward buttons, sometimes I turn the nob, sometimes I push the nob in... I can never remember which one controls the current setting and which one moves to the next setting because I don't think it's even the same each time. The volume knob is also used to control settings, and if I accidentally push the nob in,then I'm stuck in settings and there is NO WAY that I've find to change the volume unless I shut the thing off I hit the Src button.
customer_reviews.author: Chance

customer_reviews.title: Great sound
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this as a gift for my father that lives closer n Puerto Rico, the package arrived with no damage from transport. It is a good radio for the price. Sound quality is very good both from the stations and CDs. It has an auxiliary input which works great too.
customer_reviews.author: Agustín V.

customer_reviews.title: Bad Bluetooth.
customer_reviews.text: Units Bluetooth stopped working soon after installation. Tried several different Bluetooth sources. Good sound though.
customer_reviews.author: RobbyP

customer_reviews.title: Entry level has come a long way
customer_reviews.text: Very nice radio. "Entry level" stereos have come a long way in the last 25 years. Lots of bells and whistles with very easy controls. Quality sound using stock system speakers.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: its pretty good. expect to do some work.
customer_reviews.text: I love the fact that I can connect my phone, but the connections to the speakers, (or in my case, the amp) are somewhat primitive. Only 2 RCA jacks. my previous stereo, which was about 10 years old, had 4. Once I got it hooked up, the equilizer was way off. More bass than anything. It took a while to set that. Now, the only issue I'm having is the little frame around the stereo won't stay on. It'll pop off after every little while. Other than that, it's a great stereo.
customer_reviews.author: BandCamp

customer_reviews.title: :D
customer_reviews.text: Looks great & sounds great! The red light is nice and doesn't ruin your nightvison when night driving. Simple to install if you have a wiring harness for your vehicle.
customer_reviews.author: Neatoizer

customer_reviews.title: Buy in a store something happens walking tomorrow morning pick up another one done deal
customer_reviews.text: Install the radio speakers on one side one working or the rear deck I figured it could be the speakers so Ordered speakers put them on and still the same pulled radio back out And tested channel my channel three out of four we’re not working this video supposed to be brand new Took it out of the box myself I have to go through the mission of returning it that sucks
customer_reviews.author: Angel g.

customer_reviews.title: Pioneer DEH-1580MP
customer_reviews.text: This could be a great unit at a great price if------------------Pioneer had developed a display that could be viewed in the daylight. It has two options which are, dim, on or off. It good in the dark but when the sun shines, forget about seeing the display. Perhaps something it wrong with this unit. Also, my wife said that some of the tijme when she powers the unit up, the volume is wide open without the ability to turn it down until she swiches the unit from CD to radio then back. When she does this, it works as it should. Unit is going back.
customer_reviews.author: 5string

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: The sound quality lacks in the factory settings; however, the custom eq allows you to make it much better. And it pumps enough amps when hard wired to run 2 90w speaker's and 2 50w speakers without overloading the head unit. Also I've breat this up a lot over the couple years I've had it. It sat in my shop and now I made it into a portable radio and it is still kicking.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Yurko

customer_reviews.title: Its a Pioneer, do they make bad products?
customer_reviews.text: Used on a Polaris RZR as a roof mount. Cant go wrong with a Pioneer. It was well priced so even if it was damaged by water Id just get another one later.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony

customer_reviews.title: I felt like I stole something
customer_reviews.text: This stereo was so cheap, I felt like I stole something. For this value of quality/price, I don't think you'll find a better deal. I ended up with this nice stereo, dash mounting kit, wiring harness adapter, OEM stereo remover tool things, and an aux audio cable for $80?! It almost feels wrong. Almost. 10/10 would buy again. Had it all installed in about 15 minutes. But as far as this stereo goes, if you're looking for a deal, get it.
customer_reviews.author: Julia Micheli

customer_reviews.title: Sounds Great
customer_reviews.text: Love it, Outstanding Radio, very well priced. Excellent wattage, easy to install, easy to follow instructions. The Sound is Amazing
customer_reviews.author: jerry yarbrough

customer_reviews.title: Sounds great!
customer_reviews.text: Even through my trucks stock speakers this little stereo rocks! It was easy enough to install, though it was my first "car stereo" install so it took a day to find everything I needed and finish the job.
customer_reviews.author: R.N. Ronzo

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality for the $
customer_reviews.text: Pioneer has long been a favorite of mine, and this stereo lives up to it. On the lower end of the price scale, but on the higher end of the performance scale. Very adequate for filling my Ram Quad Cab with full, rich sound. Multiple settings cover everything from different equalizers for different music, to being able to create 2 custom equalizers. No need for higher priced MP3 compatible stereos. The CD player is just a plus, as I found a lot of MP3 compatible stereos don't have one.
customer_reviews.author: Keith P

customer_reviews.title: Hard to navigate
customer_reviews.text: The only thing that irks me is that there isn't a back button, and if there is I haven't found it. When adjusting the balance, fade, etc you have to click on source and get completely out of the menu to go back
customer_reviews.author: Butternut_squash

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for my husband's jeep and it works perfect. Very easy to install.
customer_reviews.author: michelle three eagles

customer_reviews.title: Swapped out the 6 disc cd changer on my 2002 ...
customer_reviews.text: Swapped out the 6 disc cd changer on my 2002 Ford Ranger XLT. Use the double din dash kit for the above vehicle and get the proper Ford wire harness
customer_reviews.author: OK chief

customer_reviews.title: It is really a great radio, sounds great
customer_reviews.text: I bought this not knowing what to expect,It is really a great radio,sounds great, works as advertised, would highly recommend this as a replacement, instructions were easy to follow.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce H.

customer_reviews.title: Works beautifully and easy to install
customer_reviews.text: Works beautifully and easy to install. If the harness for radio has a pink wire that is your accessory wire. It is supposed to be red. So matchup the pink to the red wire from your car. I had to find that out the hard way lol
customer_reviews.author: Joe lexis

customer_reviews.title: Dim problem but otherwise good product.
customer_reviews.text: It was a pretty good radio. The only problem was that when I installed in into my 2004 Honda civic the screen was very very dim I couldn't ready anything on it. I turned up the brightness and still nothing. Instead if returning it I installed it in my girlfriends car and it worked great she hasn't had any problems with it, and she's glad she finally has a radio in her car.
customer_reviews.author: Angel Mora

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Did just as asked, great for the price. Put in a 2001 Silverado. Just needed an Auxiliary input for my phone.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon F. Martinez

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed
customer_reviews.text: I needed a cheap, yet functional stereo with an aux port to replace my 2006 Prius stereo that didn't have one (I tried installing just an aux port to the factory stereo, but it didn't work). This fit the bill. It sounds a lot better than the factory stereo. One surprise was that it has awesome audio controls that allow you to get all your levels just the way you like them. I'm very pleased given how cheap this was.
customer_reviews.author: A_J_S

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price
customer_reviews.text: The stereo was perfect for the money. I bought it cheaper here online, than I could in a store. (compared actual prices) It includes an option to customize the frequency of various parts of the song/music, via hz and it works really well. You can also tune the subwoofer output and boos the bass. Several options for a low price. I would definitely recommend this to someone who needs a new radio.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon S

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price
customer_reviews.text: Another great Pioneer product. Had to replace another factory cassette player this time in a 96 Buick Park Avenue. Just be sure to remember the wiring harness and mounting bracket. CD player was easy to install and use. Whenever I have to replace a cassette or CD player, I do it with a Pioneer. Have had great experience with them.
customer_reviews.author: ghostbuster1313

customer_reviews.title: It works well. Sounds great.Great price.
customer_reviews.text: Sounds great. I've got one of these radios in all 3 of my vehicles. Two exactly the same (this one) and one with just more menu options, but the same radio. Not sure what was refurbished about this one, but we'll see how well it preforms over time. Pioneer was always one of my favorite brands. We rigged to fit with the old hardware in this install. The install kit (sold separately) was plastic crap.
customer_reviews.author: Music lover. Real music.

customer_reviews.title: Cheap, but plenty good.
customer_reviews.text: For the money, this stereo knocks it out of the park. It was a perfect fit everywhere it needed to be and wiring it up was deceptively simple. I was able to install it one day, then the next day take it out of my dash and wire a sub in without so much as a hiccup. My music sounds great now that I'm not on my OEM system and having a dedicated AUX cord instead of a casette adapter is a massive relief.
customer_reviews.author: Kal Trops

customer_reviews.title: This was a VERY INEXPENSIVE and GREAT SOUNDING stereo
customer_reviews.text: I replaced my stock stereo with a Nexus 7 (2013) tablet as my new car dash. In order to get the most out of my speakers, I needed a car stereo (this one) to utilize the amp and aux which plugged in my tablet. This was a VERY INEXPENSIVE and GREAT SOUNDING stereo.
customer_reviews.author: Gilbert

customer_reviews.title: Great radio
customer_reviews.text: This radio has been a wonderful addition to my car. We had a previous aftermarket Pioneer CD player but I wanted the AV input. The installation was easy and the sound of the radio is excellent. I do wish the volume control was also the on/off switch when you push it in instead of opening the menu. The AV input is a great input and plays music from my Iphone very well! For the price, I don't think you could get anything better!
customer_reviews.author: Tami Brannan

customer_reviews.title: Could be better
customer_reviews.text: Absoultely love this radio, its features design everything, it sounds great! The problem i have is after a couple weeks as soon as i cant return it, it makes my subwoofers thump by themselves and when i unplugg the rca's it stops and i can play other things with the amo, its just the radio that has a problem.... but if you dont have an amp i highly suggest this radio!
customer_reviews.author: Young Farms

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Product was in perfect condition and works great in my car, I was surprised how awesome this new stereo is and all the great features it offets.
customer_reviews.author: brandon hammack

customer_reviews.title: Just disappointed
customer_reviews.text: After installation I downloaded the arc app butwhen I connected my galaxy Note 10+to the usb it would just flash back and forth USB & clock and wouldn't play anything. Very disappointing!
customer_reviews.author: Jesse

customer_reviews.title: Good but dangrous ?
customer_reviews.text: Alot of features the most ive never seen i mean for the price u cant go wrong i would give it 5 starts but if u have subwoofers this radio will get extreamly hot in the back like hot to melt rubber (wireing issulation) poses a possible fire hazzord
customer_reviews.author: jacob levasseur

customer_reviews.title: Looks good
customer_reviews.text: I love pioneer. Its all I have ever used because to me its the best bang for your buck. Unit looks cool but does not tune as low as a factory unit. Install may be a problem, it was for me because the heat sink on the back left side is deep. It sticks out so far it was hitting a dash support on a ford taurus. So it is not mounted in as far as it should be.
customer_reviews.author: E. Stamper

customer_reviews.title: Low stress installation
customer_reviews.text: This unit is as close to ideal as I could hope for in terms of simplicity of operation and audio quality. The features included the now requisite 1/8" stereo input for portable music players in addition to a good enough radio and CD player. I didn't need the remote control, but if it was mounted in a camper or boat, I can see the logic. Mounting the device in a 14 year old Saab was the only issue, and an after-market adapter kit solved that problem.
customer_reviews.author: Howard Rose

customer_reviews.title: Main control
customer_reviews.text: Main control sensitive easy to get off into setting's when turning the volume knob
customer_reviews.author: Art T

customer_reviews.title: Display is NOT bright enough
customer_reviews.text: This head unit works great however, if you drive during the day like most normal people do, you will notice how hard it is to see what the head unit is displaying.. When I try to adjust the volume to a specific level I can't see what I'm adjusting it to due to the glare from the sun and lack of brightness in the display.. It's a headache for me personally. Other than that it's a great head unit.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: 5 months later, and I still love it!
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this radio for 5 months and it is holding up great. I installed it to replace the stock radio in my 2002 GMC Sierra, mainly for the AUX port. The sound quality is fantastic! I would highly recommend this to anyone looking for a good mobile stereo on a budget.
customer_reviews.author: rwhitehead

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for our RTV - yep, we are redneck hillbillies that drive around on our trails of our property and two tracks with cocktails and needed country music while doing it. It's a great little radio - lights up great at night, great sound etc. We did have to convert the connection that was on it since the RTV had a different one in place but not a biggie.
customer_reviews.author: Kim M. Visconti

customer_reviews.title: Product installed fairly easy, had to use some of old existing hardware ...
customer_reviews.text: Product installed fairly easy, had to use some of old existing hardware and adapt but went well. Son is happy to have stereo again. Likes the front aux port the best. Playing thru old speakers still sounded good, wait a week to see how it sounds thru new seakers
customer_reviews.author: G Olson

customer_reviews.title: Worked great on pontiac sunfire 2002
customer_reviews.text: Worked great on pontiac sunfire 2002. This car doesn't supply 12v source switch on the radio harness so you have to run that wire separately. I wired mine to the windshield wiper fuse and it works great. Great sound, great unit. Matches my red car!
customer_reviews.author: Jones

customer_reviews.title: Decent unit for the price
customer_reviews.text: Does what I need it to do. Like the remote, great feature. The only complaint is the plastic piece that holds the unit into the dash broke on the second day. But it fits nice and tight without it and doesn't hurt the operation at all and doesn't fall out even on the biggest bumps so it isn't a huge problem.
customer_reviews.author: Tony Schmidt

customer_reviews.title: Wife liked it.
customer_reviews.text: Put this in my wife's vehicle. It provided trouble free, quality sound.
customer_reviews.author: Stewart M.

customer_reviews.title: Nice, with a very good sound
customer_reviews.text: Nice, with a very good sound. Difficult to find what you want in the menu. Manual not real clear on the rear speaker hook up. Thought I could use the Left/Right RCA rear speaker outputs, but didn't work, even with the rear speakers turned "on" in the menu. Will have to wire to the rear speaker wires.
customer_reviews.author: JayCee

customer_reviews.title: The installation was a breeze and the sound quality is amazing.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my wife's car, so I don't get to listen to it much. But she has nothing but positive reviews on it. The installation was a breeze and the sound quality is amazing.
customer_reviews.author: bigMACpastor

customer_reviews.title: ... bought this auto stereo last year and have been disappointed from the first week I got it
customer_reviews.text: I bought this auto stereo last year and have been disappointed from the first week I got it. It works great, has some nice features. Its absolutely useless in the day time as the display is too dim. At night, yes its a good display. It has only two settings for the display, and unless it is an overcast day or you live in Alaska during their months long winter, your display will not be ale to been seen. Best advice if you get one like I did, set up the memory buttons and I guess you can then go through them like I do to find a station you like.
customer_reviews.author: jarhead6153

customer_reviews.title: Super simple to wire and install and the quality is ...
customer_reviews.text: Just ordered this along with a wiring harness for my 1993 Honda Accord. Super simple to wire and install and the quality is amazing. Couldn't believe the difference in the sound from the speakers. My old CD player head unit had terrible bass and I blamed it on my rear 6 1/2 inch speakers. This head unit changes everything. If you're on the fence about buying this for your vehicle, don't be. Buy it. Amazing quality and a reasonable price. 5/5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Louder, Louder, Louder...
customer_reviews.text: What a fantastic stereo system. Pioneer is a leader in stereo systems for decades and there's guessing in why that is. Comes with everything you need for a basic installation. Other parts may be necessary depending on your vehicles make and model. Gorgeous and sleek design. You won't be disappointed with this product or seller!
customer_reviews.author: D. Caron

customer_reviews.title: Great "BANG" for the buck
customer_reviews.text: I'm not a car audio expert. All I know is I like music and I like for it to sound good. My goal was to get the best possible sounding system on a small budget. After some shopping around and reading several reviews I was successful. Good job Pioneer for making a quality head unit for the budget friendly consumer
customer_reviews.author: Flag Defender

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work
customer_reviews.text: It doesn't work I read quite a few reviews saying it dont work well mine didn't##EDIT got it to turn on tuned my setting for how I like to bump just to get down the road and turn my car back on just to have to do it all over again. Rewired it four times total
customer_reviews.author: Burn Juan

customer_reviews.title: Be careful there used
customer_reviews.text: Box was crushed and it had been opened and returned was supposed to be new and clearly isn’t
customer_reviews.author: Js9403544

customer_reviews.title: Inexpensive, functional, car stereo head unit.
customer_reviews.text: It's a pretty well made stereo head unit, plays CDs and has an aux input, but wont break the bank.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon E.

customer_reviews.title: Great stereo for the money
customer_reviews.text: I overall love the quality and value of this stereo. I only have a minimal complaint about 2 things. 1 I am not overly fond of the red lights that stay on any time the vehicle is powered. 2 not fond of the volume switch. It is a multi functional switch and without paying attention it is easy to activate the wrong function rather than just adjusting the volume. But for the money I am quite happy.
customer_reviews.author: chris

customer_reviews.title: Another great pioneer headunit!
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my mother in law, she didn't need anything super fancy and with her I wanted a clean bright large LCD display and this fit the bill perfectly. Simple to install, simple to use and she loves the better sound in her SUV.
customer_reviews.author: ALL4SPL

customer_reviews.title: Bought for an inexpensive replacement to dead OEM radio. ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought for an inexpensive replacement to dead OEM radio. Every function worked well including plugging in my iPhone to listen to audio books. Navigating can be frustrating looking for functions you need and can take you some time to find what you need. However it did come with a remote.
customer_reviews.author: fish24/7

customer_reviews.title: Major upgrade to sound quality!
customer_reviews.text: Upgraded the stock Bose stereo on my 2002 Infiniti QX4 using the 1995+ Nissan SCOSCHE wiring harness. Connected it directly to my stock speaker amp (blue and white on Pioneer to light-green and white on stock amp) Fits my dash perfectly, no mounting at all just used the four screws that came with the Pioneer. My sub is now much more clear and responsive, stock tweaters have risen from dead! Very stoked about this. Amazing performance for price.
customer_reviews.author: M3TA4

customer_reviews.title: Now it sounds amazing!
customer_reviews.text: We thought the speakers in our car were junk. Turns out it was the radio. Now it sounds amazing!
customer_reviews.author: Tanya Coret

customer_reviews.title: Delivered on time, nice radio.
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with radio, installed in my golf cart, works great, Cd, along with remote works nicely, delivered in timely manner, very pleased, thanks to all.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Basic beaut.
customer_reviews.text: I am quite happy with this. Put it in my 1994 toyota camry xle. If it craps out on me I'll let ya know. Only gripe is that i cannot skip tracks with my remote when using my mp3 player.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great unit
customer_reviews.text: This was a great stereo and an easy install! It's got some nice equalizer presets, and the aux port is awesome! Unfortunately this unit is so nice that some one decided to steal it out of my car, but I plan on buying another one now! This is one of the best units for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Tom

customer_reviews.title: Great radio
customer_reviews.text: Great radio with easy installation. Great sound and easy controls
customer_reviews.author: Jmilleranderson

customer_reviews.title: It works as intended for me, RV-5th wheel outdoor/basement ...
customer_reviews.text: It works as intended for me, RV-5th wheel outdoor/basement stereo; but, directions for installation are typical Asian to English translation which leaves a lot desired. In other words, if one has never installed a vehicle stereo before, this might be quite a challenge.
customer_reviews.author: Myron R. Wernette

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Still have not figured out all of the controller but sounds great and fit wonderfully!
customer_reviews.author: Tina

customer_reviews.title: Good inexpensive Radio/CD/Audio player
customer_reviews.text: Installation was simple. It looks good. Sound is good. It has a remote control. Setup to use all features is best left to a child, because they are very complex. I'll eventually read through the setup instructions until I understand them and then make adjustments that I haven't yet needed.
customer_reviews.author: Philip H. Ness

customer_reviews.title: inexpensive but good
customer_reviews.text: Installation was easy; sound is excellent; a real bargain for the price.
customer_reviews.author: The River Horus

customer_reviews.title: Great head unit for the price
customer_reviews.text: Great head unit for the price. Fit my 2004 Honda Accord perfectly after using a harness. Absolutely no problems with performance and great when on a tight budget. Nothing but positive vibes from Pioneer...Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Steelcity21

customer_reviews.title: Great Car Stereo!
customer_reviews.text: There's not a lot I can say about this. I got exactly what I expected and what I wanted. I am very happy with the product, it functions just as it's supposed to and I have had it for about half a year with no problems at all. Pioneer puts out the good stuff, I can't deny that.
customer_reviews.author: Dzmitry93

customer_reviews.title: Great value and quality
customer_reviews.text: Tossed this into a 1987 F-150, doubled up the speaker leads as the vehicle only has a single speaker in each door. It kicks Pioneer 6.5"s and she sounds great. Controls are a bit complicated and take a while to get used to, but this is unbeatable for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Ben

customer_reviews.title: My wife loved it,!
customer_reviews.text: If you can buy the right harness it will be easy to install!!!
customer_reviews.author: Virgil P.

customer_reviews.title: Great radio for the price
customer_reviews.text: all the features you want in a CD/Radio at a great price. sound quality and function is great. programming is not always intuitive but it is handled by the instructions. Nice to have a remote for laying in the bed of my truck and changing the CD track or radio station.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Reid

customer_reviews.title: This has been much better than expected for the price
customer_reviews.text: This has been much better than expected for the price. It's in an old car with mediocre speakers, but having a working stereo is fantastic. Really easy to use, if a slightly confusing menu structure the first time through.
customer_reviews.author: JDL

customer_reviews.title: Great deal for the money
customer_reviews.text: Great deal for the money, put it in my golf cart to replace a old broken one. Sound is decent!
customer_reviews.author: Anthony J. Ford 12/14/54

customer_reviews.title: Very good unit for the price
customer_reviews.text: Very good unit for the price. Would have liked to see an easier treble and bass adjustment. Mostly it is easy to install and it's easy to use. Sound is good too
customer_reviews.author: Franc835

customer_reviews.title: Sounded better than what it replaced.
customer_reviews.text: The unit had all the features I wanted and none of those that I did not want. The sound was much better than the radio it replaced using the same speakers and wiring. It was listed as "Amazon's Choice" and no doubt for very good reasons.
customer_reviews.author: an

customer_reviews.title: pioneer is the best in my opinion
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a gift for my sister, she says she loves it, pioneer is the best in my opinion, great buy
customer_reviews.author: The Malloys

customer_reviews.title: Solid for the money.
customer_reviews.text: Been using it for a while via aux and CD and it hasn't let me down. Can't comment on radio reception- never use it. Looks great inside a dark car with other red and white lighting. Volume knob and buttons feel nice enough.
customer_reviews.author: Sernie Banders

customer_reviews.title: 6 months = AMP ERROR
customer_reviews.text: 6 months to the day that I purchased this product, and the amp died. Screen flashes nothing but "AMP ERROR." The manual states to contact a Pioneer Service Station. I can't wait to see what comes of this. I never even turn the volume up that loud so it's not as though I was crushing the amp... Do NOT purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Better stereos out there.
customer_reviews.text: The operational knobs and buttons are counter intuitive. The operators manual writing was so small I had to use a magnifying glass to read adjustment procedures. Basically just disappointed with this stereo, very glad I am selling this car soon.
customer_reviews.author: Alan of Anacortes, WA
